Text:
Anyone else have a problem playing this after burning?
Tried on CD player and DVD player, but the DTS flickers on and off on my amp
It works greate for me, bured it with nero and are playing the cd on my dvd-player.
Works perfect here as well.  Nice DTS sounds.

-> juggleruk

it's likely your DVD player, or more likely, your stereo are doing some sort of upsampling or post processing on the PCM stream. my stereo kit did the same thing until I turned off bitmapping on my PS3. try and turn off all the post processing or surround effects on your stereo box and you may or may not be fine. could be your stereo just doesn't like the whole... DTS thing. who knows?
I burn the cd, then ripped its songs as if it was normal cd, changed the wav extensions to .dts and played it using vlc... sounds GREAT.
Has anybody noticed that the album is named "SYNCHRONICITY," and NOT "Every Breath You Take?"  It really should be relabeled.
